channel.title: R on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in R on Academic

item.title: Blogs_tips from old site
item.description: Blogs_tips Table of Contents Subset bamfile with chromosome names and convert into paired fastq Cluster management R code for ploting nomograph from competing risk survival analysis model Setting docker download mirror site Install bioconductor R package using VPS Install bioconductor R package using mirror at UTSC Tips for using Tianhe-2 super computer Subset bamfile with chromosome names and convert into paired fastq software required: sambamba and bam2fastx from tophat binary distribution.
